name: Atoms
description: 【Based on VR,type of MOBA game】. 【Single play with CPU】. 【Multiple plays as a pair of teams or antagonism】. 【3 heros to choose】. 【9 weapons can play】. 【Skill and equipment system】. 【Upgrading and combo rewards】. 【A strong sense of battle】.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10,Windows7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 16 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10,Windows7 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 32 GB RAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space
